title: An hril Bethlehem daiah chuan zai mawi ri
lyrics:
An hril Bethlehem daiah chuan zai mawi ri,
Berampute hnenah a lo eng chhuak ta;
"Hlau suh ula, ngai r'u chanchintha ka rawn thlen,
Lal thar alo piangta a hming Imanuela".

Chungchung berah, ropui rawh se,
Lei chungah hian rem leng rawh se;
Sual bawih zawng zawngte lo chhuakin,
Leiah mihringte hnenah remthu leng rawh se.

He hun mawi lo thleng hi miten an chawimawi,
Thlen nan 'silhpuan mawi' ti'n miten an thleng maw?
Kei ka thlang a chun chawi lai Lal thlen in hnawnga,
Lal riangvai lo piang chu, a hming Imanuela.

Aw, tunah Bethlehem panin kal ila,
Kan tan Lal lo piang chu chibai buk vein;
Aw, hlimin i zai ang, 'Halelui' sa rualin,
Lal thar chawimawi chiam r'u, a hming Imanuela.

Lal Isu, tunah hian ka thinlung chhungah,
Daltu che thlarauvin min tihbosak la;
Bethlehem i vaih ai tunah ka thinlung hi,
Chatuan, chatuan thleng pawhin i ta lo ni se.
